mapper.insert: insert into m_table (mId, mPass, mName, mEmail, mPhone, mPro, mPass2) values (#{mId}, #{mPass}, #{mName}, #{mEmail}, #{mPhone}, #{mPro}, #{mPass2})
mapper.select: select * from m_table where mId=#{mId} and mPass=#{mPass}
select mId from m_table where mId=#{mId}
select * from m_table order by id desc limit #{start}, #{limit} -- HashMap = 여기서 parameterType을 java.util.HashMap으로 준다
